channel.title: +1 Forward - Apocalypse Keys
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/apocalypse-keys
Rach and Rich bring on Rae Nedjadi to talk about their game Apocalypse Keys, which is crowd-funding on Kickstarter until October 11, 2022
Timecodes: 0:02:40 - Read a Sitch about The Promise of a Move 0:11:56 - Open Your Brain to Apocalypse Keys 0:22:09 - Act Under Fire
Check out Apocalypse Keys on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/evilhat/apocalypse-keys
Find Rae's website here: https://www.swordqueengames.com/
